Glenn lives here

I'm a web developer living in Reno, Nevada. During the day I work at 970 Design, I'm also open to projects on the side.

Favorite things outside of work:

  • Mountain biking, and bicycles in general.
  • Trying to make my dogs tired.
  • Video games like CS2 and R.E.P.O.
  • Trying not to die.
  • Finding new music.
  • Snowboarding.
  • Grilling hot dogs.
